Detailed Description

CXLRestConsumerComponent.

Introduces three new events:

onBeforeRestCall onAfterRestCall onRequestComplete

attachBehavior ( $  name,
$  behavior 
) [inherited]

Attaches a behavior to this component.

Calls the Yii implementation of this method, then injects the behaviors methods into our class.

Parameters:
string $name The behavior's name. It should uniquely identify this behavior.
mixed $behavior the behavior configuration. This is passed as the first parameter to YiiBase::createComponent to create the behavior object.
Returns:
IBehavior the behavior object

makeMapArray ( $  apiName,
$  subApiName = null,
array $  apiMap,
$  setRequestMap = true 
) [protected]

Creates an array for requestMap.

Parameters:
array $apiMap The map of items to insert into the array. Format is the same as makeMapItem
bool $setRequestMap If false, will NOT insert constructed array into requestMap
Returns:
array Returns the constructed array item ready to insert into your requestMap
See also:
makeMapItem

Definition at line 172 of file CXLRestConsumerComponent.php.

References makeMapItem().

Here is the call graph for this function:

makeMapItem ( $  itemLabel,
$  parameterName = null,
$  required = false,
$  options = array(),
array &$  target = null 
) [protected]

S Creates an entry for requestMap and inserts it into the array.

Parameters:
string $itemLabel The label or friendly name of this map item
string $parameterName The actual parameter name to send to API. If not specified, will default to $itemLabel
bool $required Set to true if the parameter is required
array $options If supplied, will merge with generated options
array $target If supplied, will insert into array
Returns:
array Returns the constructed array item ready to insert into your requestMap
